metadata.feature_description: Verifies that the AccountSettings module installs correctly and registers with the DNN/Evoq framework

steps.action: Logged into DNN as SuperUser and navigated to Settings > Extensions
steps.expected: Extensions page should load without errors
steps.actual: Extensions page loaded successfully showing Installed Extensions tab
PersonaBar extensions list displayed with Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings visible

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Confirm module appears in installed extensions list

steps.expected: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings should appear in the list
steps.actual: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings version 10.1.1 displayed in the Installed Extensions list under Persona Bar filter

steps.action: Clicked on extension to view details
steps.actual: Extension details displayed showing: Extension Type: Persona Bar, Name: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings, Friendly Name: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings, Version: 10.01.01

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify assembly is deployed to bin folder

steps.expected: Assembly file should exist in C:\DNN\EvoqEngageDoneDev\bin\

steps.action: Verified DNN Core dependency (08.00.00) by checking DotNetNuke.dll in bin folder
steps.actual: DotNetNuke.dll found in bin folder - dependency satisfied

steps.action: Verified Dnn.PersonaBar.UI dependency by checking Dnn.PersonaBar.Library.dll
steps.actual: Dnn.PersonaBar.Library.dll found in bin folder - dependency satisfied
Manifest declares: CoreVersion 08.00.00, ManagedPackage Dnn.PersonaBar.UI v01.00.00 - both satisfied

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Azure compatibility flag is set correctly

steps.expected: azureCompatible element should be set to true
steps.actual: Manifest contains <azureCompatible>true</azureCompatible> at line 19, confirming Azure compatibility

observations: The PersonaBar menu item 'nav_Accounts' is visible in the PersonaBar sidebar, confirming the module is registered with the framework
The module is assigned to order 980 in the PersonaBar menu per manifest configuration
Default permissions are set to: Administrators, Content Managers, Content Editors, Community Manager
The extension uses CSS class 'useravatar' for its PersonaBar icon
The DNN PersonaBar Extensions UI does not display Azure compatibility flag directly - verification was done via manifest code review
